701779f.text:
Sedgwick Avenue, east side, between its junction with Reservoir Avenue and W. 197th Street, shewing the Church of Our Lady of Angels (R.C.).G.W. Bromley's map of 1924 as revised to September 1932 shows
the church no longer to be there.
May 8, 1928
P. L. Sperr
Ne No 622
701779f.folder: Sedgwick Avenue & Reservoir Avenue, Bronx, NY
